import React from 'react' const Today = ({ day, daily, fToC }) => { return (
{day}
{daily.data !== undefined ? ` ${fToC(daily.data[0].temperatureLow)}°` : null}    {daily.data !== undefined ? ` ${fToC(daily.data[0].temperatureHigh)}°` : null}
